description: Front BoundaryT1-Horse ChestnutCrown reduce by a further 0.5 metres from the previous points (excluding regrowth).ALL ITEMS INCLUDING REMOVING ARISING DEBRIS, LEAVING SITE CLEAN AND TIDY.*For Reasons Please see tree report.T2-LimeRepollard to previous points.ALL ITEMS INCLUDING REMOVING ARISING DEBRIS, LEAVING SITE CLEAN AND TIDY.???	See map for location.???	The works are part of a regular maintenance programme to retain the tree at a suitable size for its location.???	The proposed works would not reduce the amenity value of the tree and will allow sustainable tree management in the long termLeft Hand SideT3-LimeRepollard to previous points.ALL ITEMS INCLUDING REMOVING ARISING DEBRIS, LEAVING SITE CLEAN AND TIDY.See map for location.The works are part of a regular maintenance programme to retain the tree at a suitable size for its location.The proposed works would not reduce the amenity value of the tree and will allow sustainable tree management in the long term
